Comments_List: Professor Lee was great in explicating the intricacies and complexities of "precarity." It is a very reading-heavy class and will engage you with various complex thoughts.
I appreciated the variety of sources we encountered throughout the course.

I would highly recommend this class to anyone interested in how aesthetic operations interact with neoliberalism, as well as issues of precarity. Professor Lee is great and you will take away so much from this class!
